fields.title: Welcome to My Blog!
fields.author: Denis Lokwo
fields.content: This is the first post on my new portfolio blog. Here, I'll share updates, tutorials, and insights from my journey as a full-stack developer.

fields.title: How I Built My Portfolio with Django
fields.author: Denis Lokwo
fields.content: In this post, I walk through the process of building my portfolio site using Django, including tips for structuring apps, styling, and deploying.

fields.title: Top 5 Tools for Modern Web Development
fields.author: Denis Lokwo
fields.content: Discover my favorite tools and libraries for building fast, accessible, and maintainable web applications in 2025.
